QueryDefinition.Query:
with person as ( SELECT DISTINCT t.PERSON_ID FROM {sc}.CONDITION_OCCURRENCE t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT t.PERSON_ID FROM {sc}.DRUG_EXPOSURE t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID )
SELECT PERSON_ID, 1 as GENDER_SOURCE_VALUE, 1999 as YEAR_OF_BIRTH, PERSON_ID PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE FROM person order by PERSON_ID
